## max() function

Returns the entry with the maximum value of a map.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function max<T>(map: Map<T, number>): [T, number];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  map | <code>Map&lt;T, number&gt;</code> | map the map to get the maximum value of |

<b>Returns:</b>

`[T, number]`

the entry with the maximum value
